title: Thinking of Selling Your Home? These Tips May Help
summary: U.S. home sales have been picking up in recent months, which is a good sign for the economy--and for home sellers, too. Soon, however, it will be winter, which is traditionally a slow time in the real-estate market. In fact, many sellers elect to take their homes off the market and then re-list as spring approaches.
tag-1: Thinking of Selling Your Home? These Tips May Help

tag-3: Hoping to sell your home despite the winter slowdown? Here are some strategies to consider:
